message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SD, cs.NE 

This paper is about Natural Language Generation (NLG), which is a subfield of Computational Linguistics (CL). Therefore, cs.CL is the most likely category. The paper also discusses the use of modal logic programming, which is a subfield of Artificial Intelligence (AI), making cs.AI another likely category. The paper also involves the use of grammatical and conceptual resources, which are related to Language Generation (LG), making cs.LG another possible category. The paper also discusses the implementation of the SPUD system, which involves sentence planning, making cs.SD a possible category. Finally, the paper discusses the use of declarative representations to achieve desired behavior, which is related to Neural Networks (NE), making cs.NE a possible category.
